name: Royal Strike
description:
Ready, drag, and… FIRE!
Welcome to the ROYAL STRIKE zone!

Simple RPG game with futuristic design.
Equip your character with weapons and items to destroy enemies.
All you have to do? DRAG and DROP!

Game Features
◆ simple and easy play : just drag and fire towards the enemy.
◆ many many charaters: collect them!
◆ about 10 weapons: we might update more later. who knows?
◆ very scary boss: clear them for loooooots!
